short_description: 【Self-Adhesive Pipe Insulation Wrap for All-Weather Protection】 This foam insulation wrap provides a reliable barrier against energy loss, moisture, and temperature extremes. Its self-adhesive design ensures a quick and secure installation for effective thermal management of your plumbing.

Quick Peel-and-Stick Installation for DIY Projects Designed for effortless application. Simply measure, cut to length, peel off the protective film, and wrap it around the pipe. The strong adhesive backing creates a tight, lasting seal without the need for additional tapes or tools.

Large 4" x 33 ft Coverage for Extensive Piping With generous dimensions of 4 inches in width and 33 feet in total length, this roll is ideal for protecting long runs of outdoor or indoor pipes, helping to reduce heat loss on hot water lines and prevent condensation and freezing on cold lines.

Integrated Aluminum Foil Layer for Enhanced Performance The outer aluminum foil layer serves multiple purposes: it reflects radiant heat to improve thermal efficiency, acts as a flame-retardant barrier, and provides an extra shield against moisture and weather damage for long-lasting durability.

Durable, Multi-Purpose Material for Various Applications Constructed from closed-cell foam and foil, this wrap is waterproof, weather-resistant, and suitable for a wide range of pipes, including HVAC, plumbing, and refrigeration lines, offering versatile protection for residential and light commercial use.
